content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: QLABEL
      operator: longer_than
      value: 40
Core:
  Id: CORE-000222
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when QLABEL > 40 chars.
Outcome:
  Message: QLABEL > 40 chars.
  Output Variables:
    - IDVAR
    - IDVARVAL
    - QLABEL
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0416
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: This is the long name or label associated with QNAM.
                  The value in QLABEL cannot be longer than 40 characters. This will
                  often be the column label in the sponsor's original dataset.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: QLABEL
                Section: Supplemental Qualifiers
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - SUPP--

json.Description: Raise an error when QLABEL > 40 chars.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: This is the long name or label associated with QNAM. The value in QLABEL cannot be longer than 40 characters. This will often be the column label in the sponsor's original dataset.
